title: Emergency Medical Services (EMS) Education Through Virtual Field Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic medicine and emergency medical procedures
context.additional_context: VR/simulation-based training program conducted in smartphone-based limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can accurately identify three or more EMS training center simulation facilities via VR-based virtual field learning.
Learners can explain response procedures for actual emergency scenarios with over 80% accuracy using VFT content.
Learners can summarize five or more core elements of the EMS curriculum through VFT videos with Uzbek/Russian audio commentary.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
